snippet: The Yankees’ general manager, like so many of his players, has had his private life laid bare.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column asserts that New York Yankees general manager Brian Cashman, famous for fluidly managing the off-field crises involving individual players on the roster, is now facing his own trial of public scrutiny; notes Cashman's private life has mushroomed into a front-page tabloid scandal, with details of his deteriorating marriage and relationships with other women playing out daily in public.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees’ general manager, like so many of his players, has had his private life laid bare.

headline.seo: It’s Brian Cashman’s Turn to Keep Focus Amid the Glare
headline.main: It’s Cashman’s Turn to Stay Focused Amid the Glare
headline.print_headline: It’s Cashman’s Turn To Stay Focused Amid the Glare
